Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameControllerTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameControllerTest
class GameControllerTest
extends java.lang.Object
Class that deals with GameController testing. It used mocks and spies in order to check number of methods' calls.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) void disconnectionDuringMultiplayerModeChoices()
    Test used to check client disconnection while performing initial choices.
    (package private) void fourthPlayerPositioningValidity()
    Test focused over initial resources positioning for the fourth player, due to the fact that he is the only one that can make a mistake performing this action.
    (package private) void handleLeaderChoiceMessage()
    Tests if initial leader choice action with a correct and a badly formatted message.
    (package private) void handleResourceChoiceMessage()
    Tests performInitialResourceChoice calls over player that is attempting to perform it.
    (package private) void playerConnectionHandlingTest()
    Verifies if game controller calls handlePlayerReconnection method of game.
    (package private) void soloModeConnectionsHandling()
    This methods tests game controller method through making assumptions on how many times a solo mode game changes its state.
